ARABIC: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Did we not bring you up among us as a child and did you not spend many years of your life among us?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The Pharaoh) said: "Did we not bring you up as a child? And you lived a number of years of your life with us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said: "Did we not bring you up among us when you were a child?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh said, "Did we not bring you up in our home as an infant and did you not live with us for many years
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “Did we do not raise you amongst us, as a child? And you spent many years of your life among us!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Fir`awn) said (to Musa): "Did we not bring you up among us as a child And you did dwell many years of your life with us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Firon) said: Did we not bring you up as a child among us, and you tarried among us for (many) years of your life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Did we not raise thee amongst us as a child? Didst thou not tarry among us years of thy life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said (unto Moses): Did we not rear thee among us as a child? And thou didst dwell many years of thy life among us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said to Moses, "Did we not bring you up among us as a child? And you spent several years of your life with us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Fir'awn said: brought we not thee up amongst us as a child? And thou tarriedst amongst us for many years of thy life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He [i.e. Pharaoh] said, ‘Did we not rear you as a child among us, and did you not stay with us for years of your life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said: "Did we not cherish thee as a child among us, and didst thou not stay in our midst many years of thy life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] said [to Musa (Moses)]: "Did we not bring you up among us as a child? And you did dwell many years of your life with us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Pharaoh) said (to Moses): 'Did We not bring you up when you were a child? And have you not spent years of your life amongst us?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you stayed among us for many of your years?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:18] He, Pharaoh, said, to Moses, ‘Did we not rear you among us, in our homes, as a child?, as an infant, only recently born but weaned, and did you not stay with us for years of your life?, for thirty years — he would dress from Pharaoh’s clothes and ride chariots of his, and was referred to as Pharaoh’s son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said): Pharaoh looked at Moses and said: (Did we not rear thee among us as a child?) Moses (And thou didst dwell many years of your life among us) and stayed with us for 30 years,
